title: Title
welcome_message: Welcome you're at a good place

yassa.description: Poulet Yassa is a dish made from chicken marinated in an onion, lemon, mustard, and spice sauce, then grilled or fried. It is usually served with rice.

niebe.description: Niébé is a popular dish in West Africa, often prepared with white or red beans cooked in a spicy sauce made with tomatoes, onions, garlic, and sometimes with meat or fish.

rice.description: Riz au Poisson consists of rice cooked in a spicy tomato sauce with fish, vegetables (carrots, cabbage, eggplants), and spices, offering a rich and delicious flavor.
